abstract: Chicago Cubs face threat of litigation from players' union after reassigning third baseman Kris Bryant to minor league camp; move could delay Bryant's free agency following outstanding hitting during spring training; other baseball news noted.
lead_paragraph: The reassignment of third baseman Kris Bryant to minor league camp brought a threat of litigation.

headline.main: Union Not Happy About Cubs’ Move
headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Baseball; Union Not Happy About Cubs’ Move

snippet: The reassignment of third baseman Kris Bryant to minor league camp brought a threat of litigation.
